message: Let's split it evenly to get this over with!
You can't get away that easily!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken for a ride!
You're not giving me enough, Alice. I'm getting impatient!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm not backing down, Alice. Meet me in the middle or I'll walk away with the majority!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! I'll give you most of the money, but I'm not going to be left with nothing!
I'm taking control now, Alice. You're running out of options!
